```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

# Loading in necessary libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)

# Reading in data

# Trump's first 6 months of donations in 2016 are from the FEC:
# https://www.fec.gov/data/receipts/individual-contributions

trump_2016 <- read_csv("../data/04-incumbency/trump_2016_first_six_months.csv") %>% 
  select(committee_name, contribution_receipt_date, contribution_receipt_amount) %>%
  arrange(contribution_receipt_date) %>% 
  mutate(total = cumsum(contribution_receipt_amount),
         total = total / 1000000) %>% 
  rename(date = contribution_receipt_date)
```

```{r Trump 2016 donors}

# Graphing Trump's first 6 months of individual contributions in 2016

trump_2016_graph <- trump_2016 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = total)) + 
  geom_line(color = "red") + 
  theme_classic() +
  labs(title = "First Six Months of Individual Contributions to Trump's Re-election Campaign",
       x = "",
       y = "Cumulative Total (in Millions of $)")

trump_2016_plotly <- ggplotly(trump_2016_graph)

```
